target_audience: CTOs, VPs of Engineering, Technical Founders at scale-ups (20-200 employees)
output_format: Personalized PDF report with scoring + recommendations

core_categories.description: Measures the team's ability to consistently ship quality features and respond to business needs
core_categories.healthy_score_indicators: Regular, predictable releases with minimal rollbacks
core_categories.risk_score_indicators: Missed deadlines, extended development cycles, frequent hotfixes
core_categories.business_impact: Direct correlation to time-to-market and competitive advantage

core_categories.description: Evaluates the scalability, maintainability, and long-term sustainability of the technical foundation
key_dimensions: Accumulated technical debt and remediation strategy
core_categories.healthy_score_indicators: Well-documented, tested codebase with clear architecture patterns
core_categories.risk_score_indicators: Legacy systems, low test coverage, unclear architecture decisions
core_categories.business_impact: Affects development speed, system reliability, and future scalability costs

core_categories.description: Assesses team morale, collaboration effectiveness, and organizational sustainability
core_categories.healthy_score_indicators: Low turnover, high engagement, active knowledge sharing
core_categories.risk_score_indicators: High attrition, siloed teams, lack of mentorship
core_categories.business_impact: Directly affects recruiting costs, productivity, and institutional knowledge retention

core_categories.description: Evaluates automation, monitoring, and operational excellence capabilities
key_dimensions: CI/CD pipeline maturity and automation level
Disaster recovery and business continuity readiness
core_categories.healthy_score_indicators: Fully automated deployments, comprehensive monitoring, fast recovery
core_categories.risk_score_indicators: Manual deployments, reactive monitoring, unclear incident response
core_categories.business_impact: Affects system uptime, operational costs, and regulatory compliance

core_categories.description: Assesses the quality and effectiveness of technical strategy and governance
key_dimensions: Technical roadmap alignment with business goals
Engineering leadership capacity and succession planning
core_categories.healthy_score_indicators: Clear technical vision, documented decisions, aligned with business strategy
core_categories.risk_score_indicators: Ad-hoc decisions, misalignment with business, single points of failure in leadership
core_categories.business_impact: Determines strategic execution capability and organizational scaling potential

core_categories.description: Evaluates the organization's preparedness for team and system growth
key_dimensions: Financial efficiency (cost per feature, cloud spend optimization)
core_categories.healthy_score_indicators: Efficient onboarding, scalable systems, clear processes
core_categories.risk_score_indicators: Slow hiring, performance bottlenecks, inefficient processes
core_categories.business_impact: Determines ability to capture market opportunities and scale efficiently

core_categories.description: Measures the balance between feature delivery and technical investment
key_dimensions: Balance between new features and technical improvements
core_categories.healthy_score_indicators: Dedicated innovation time, continuous improvement, high code quality
core_categories.risk_score_indicators: Pure feature factory, outdated practices, no learning culture
core_categories.business_impact: Affects long-term competitiveness, ability to attract talent, and technical differentiation

maturity_levels.description: On the right track with room for optimization

report_deliverables.executive_summary: 1-page overview with overall score and top 3 priorities
report_deliverables.category_breakdown: Detailed scoring for each of the 7 categories with benchmarks
report_deliverables.risk_analysis: Identification of critical gaps and their business impact
report_deliverables.next_steps: Clear CTA for strategy call to discuss implementation
